name: Cursed Dungeon (itch)
description:
You are an adventurer tied to the dungeon! When you die, attempt to destroy the new adventurers and hover over their corpse to resurrect yourself. Try to reach the red fires!

Arrow keys for movement

Space for interaction.

Use F7 to skip the level if a game-breaking bug appears (you must be in human form, not a ghost, which is another bug). Sorry!
